title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2208.9 - Pending PAR's
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2208.9 - Pending PAR's

State Regulations

Where a provision of this Code is amended or an
applicable statute is enacted or amended during the pendency of a PAR, the
determination shall be in accordance with the statute or Code as it existed at
the time the rent administrator's order was issued, unless the relevant law or
regulation states otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2208.9

Amended

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
